data.name: Toy Soldiers: War Chest - Masters of the Universe™ Pack
data.detailed_description:
By the power of Grayskull, Prince Adam becomes He-Man, the most powerful man in the universe. Endowed with unimaginable strength and courage, He-Man, Battle Cat and his Eternian warriors protect Eternia’s toy box from the forces of darkness. The Masters of the UniverseTM Pack also includes these signature units:

  • Ride Battle Cat into hordes of enemies and slash them down with his massive claws
  • Command Man-at-Arms as he leads the Eternian guard into battle
  • Use Orko and the magical race of Trollans to disable turrets with spells

And many more Eternian-inspired units, upgrades and items!
data.about_the_game:
By the power of Grayskull, Prince Adam becomes He-Man, the most powerful man in the universe. Endowed with unimaginable strength and courage, He-Man, Battle Cat and his Eternian warriors protect Eternia’s toy box from the forces of darkness. The Masters of the UniverseTM Pack also includes these signature units:

  • Ride Battle Cat into hordes of enemies and slash them down with his massive claws
  • Command Man-at-Arms as he leads the Eternian guard into battle
  • Use Orko and the magical race of Trollans to disable turrets with spells

And many more Eternian-inspired units, upgrades and items!
data.short_description: By the power of Grayskull, Prince Adam becomes He-Man, the most powerful man in the universe. Endowed with unimaginable strength and courage, He-Man, Battle Cat and his Eternian warriors protect Eternia’s toy box from the forces of darkness.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD Phenom 9850 Quad-Core Processor (4 CPUs) @ 2.5GHz 
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GT 1GB / AMD HD 4870 1GB (DX 10, 10.1, 11) 
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 11 Compliant Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Broadband connection and service required for multiplayer mode.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 @ 3.2GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD X8 FX-8350 @ 4GHz (8 CPUs) 
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB / AMD HD 7870 2GB 
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 11 Compliant Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Broadband connection and service required for multiplayer mode.
